title: Champion Portraits Not Showing Up In Lobbies
body:
A few minutes ago I tried to queue up for a ranked game and got an error that said something along the lines of "Something unexpected happened while creating the lobby".

Tried to queue up again and was successfully put into a match, except I could not get the champion portraits to load. Searching for specific champions and clicking where I knew it should be didn't work either, and I wasn't seeing anything where the ban icons are as well (though all the sound effects and voices still happened).

So after it forced me to dodge for not selecting a champion, I restarted the client and tried to load into another game... Same issue, and another dodge.

I'm a little peeved at the lost LP, but any ideas on how to fix this? Do I need to reinstall? =/

edit; I've since been able to load into games just fine. No idea what fixed it or what caused it to begin with. Ugh.

replies.body:
When you get into the champion select/banning screen but you can't see any of the champions to pick or the buttons aren't responding, it's good sign that your network's connection to the game server is unstable. You don't see the champion pictures because your network isn't able to pull that data from our servers.

Look through our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for ways you can stay connected to the game servers. Be sure to test any changes in a custom match to avoid a leaverbuster!
